definition: to protect/to defend/to guard against/to prevent
to decrease/to lose/to damage/to harm/(coll.) to speak sarcastically/to deride/caustic/mean/one of the 64 hexagrams of the Book of Changes (䷨)

sentences.english: A stop order that is executed only during the closing range of the trading session.
sentences.chinese: 只有在交易盤要結束的範圍內才執行的防損訂單。

sentences.english: There has been no injury, but steps have been taken to reduce the risk of injury.
sentences.chinese: 防損就是預測損失並採取措施以保證風險保持在最低。

sentences.english: Undertake take precautions against natural calamities prevents the another obligation that caustic job is an underwriter actively.
sentences.chinese: 積極進行防災防損工作是保險人的又一義務。
